Package clients

Class GeneralInformationRepositoryStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clients.GeneralInformationRepositoryStub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface

    public class GeneralInformationRepositoryStub
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
    Representation of a place where the entities log their state transitions.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

      Stub entity to represent the will of the Broker to issue a New Snapshot on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the affirmation that the Race the is Over provided by the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the Broker,BettingCentre and ControlCentre to issue a New BrokerState on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to Set its Ability on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to Set its Final Position on the RacingTrack on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to Set its Number of Increments performed on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to Set its Position on the RacingTrack on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to Set its Probability to Win on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setHorseJockeyStatus​(int horseJockeyId, HorseJockeyState status)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey,Stable, ControlCentre, RacingTrack and Paddock to issue a New HorseJockeyState on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setRaceDistance​(int distance)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the RacingTrack to issue a New Race Distance on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setRaceNumber​(int number)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the RacingTrack to issue a New Race Number on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setSpectatorAmountOfMoney​(int spectatorId, int amount)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the Spectator to Set its Amount of Money on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setSpectatorBetAmount​(int spectatorId, int bet)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the Spectator to Set its Bet Amount of Money on the GeneralInformationRepository.
      void setSpectatorBetSelection​(int spectatorId, int selection)
      Stub entity to represent the will of the Spectator to Set its Bet Selection of Money on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to represent the will of the HorseJockey to wait For All the Horses on the GeneralInformationRepository.

      Stub entity to shutdown the premises of the GeneralInformationRepository.

      • createConnectionWithServer

        private lib.communication.ClientCom createConnectionWithServer​()
                                                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a connection to the correspondent server (meaning the GeneralInformationRepository).
        Returns:
        the communication with the server, already defined over a ClientCom object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if a connection could not be established with success.
